events.message: The claimant reported a rear-end collision involving their vehicle at the downtown intersection during rush hour, causing significant damage.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and vehicle damage description provided.
An experienced claims agent specializing in auto accidents was assigned to handle the case promptly and ensure quick follow-up.
The claimant was contacted to acknowledge receipt of the claim and informed about the next steps in the assessment process.
The claimant was asked to submit police reports, photos of vehicle damage, and contact details of the involved parties for investigation.
All requested documentation, including the police report and vehicle repair estimate, was submitted by the claimant on time.
The internal investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence to validate the circumstances around the car accident.
Investigation confirmed the liability of the other vehicle and verified the damage as described, supporting claim approval.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to cover the repair costs and rental vehicle fees during the repair period.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling and clear communication throughout the claim process.
Claim approval was finalized based on the comprehensive investigation and acceptance of the settlement terms.
The agreed settlement payment was issued promptly to the claimant’s account to cover all approved repair expenses.
The claim case was officially closed after confirming payment receipt and claimant’s satisfaction with the resolution.
All documents and records related to the auto accident claim were archived in compliance with company retention policies.
